item.title: About
item.description: Hi there! My name is Hamish Pierpont. I’m a software developer based in Gainesville, FL, where I study computer science and mathematics at the University of Florida. Technologies Programming Languages: C++, Python, [Java|Type]Script, Java, LaTeX Frameworks + Libraries: express.js, mongoose, a little bit of React Databases: MongoDB, SQLite Operating Systems: MacOS, Windows 10, Fedora 32
